line_1: Onward resistless rolls the infuriate surge,
line_2: Clouds follow clouds, and mountains mountains urge;
Turn the broad helm, the fluttering canvas urge

line_1: YOU form with chemic hands the airy surge,
line_2: Mix with broad vans, with shadowy tridents urge.

line_1: His bulk gigantic through the troubled surge;
line_2: Wide-waving fins round floating islands urge

line_1: And hears with ear appall'd, th' impetuous surge
line_2: Fades in the west, sees, from the rocky verge,
